description.narrative: The project is structured around the following objectives: (1) Facilitate exchanges on the lessons learned and accountability mechanisms of the "Voix des paysans "project implemented during the period 2016 and 2018, (2) Write an initial report (Inception Report) of the second Phase. The expected results for this project are: (1) Fopabu (our partner) and its Agricultural Advocacy Group (GPA)is reassured by its partners and members in its role as a key framework for influencing agricultural policies, (2) An Inception report is produced, highlighting the relevant recommendations that capitalize on the first phase of the project and guide the interventions of the second phase. The activities planned to achieve these results are the exchange workshops and reflection on the lessons learned and the accountability mechanisms. The retreats of GPA members for a process of strengthening the partnership.

participating-org.narrative: Oxfam Novib is one of the 17 national affiliates of the Oxfam International Confederation. It started life in 1956 as the Netherlands Organisation for International Assistance (Novib), and joined forces with Oxfam in 1994. Working together in confederation, the Oxfam affiliates can speak with one clear and compelling voice on issues of global concern: climate change, health and education forall, agriculture, trade, and conflicts and emergencies. Oxfam established this country office to support local organizations and projects. Through this local office Oxfam Novib directly contributes towards this project’s implementation.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to a sustainable livelihood

description.narrative: Strengthened CSOs: # National CSOs increasingly participate in or initiate influencing and advocacy efforts on (i) Sustainable Food production and consumption, (ii) Land Rights and (iii) Climate Change with a gender senstive lens.
